org.mini2Dx.ecs.component

Class DefaultComponentStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ecs.component.DefaultComponentStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentStore

    public class DefaultComponentStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentStore
    Default implementation of ComponentStore that allows for concurrent modification
